name: Tales of Cthulhu Part1:Precipice of Madness
name_original: Tales of Cthulhu Part1:Precipice of Madness
description:
The first part of a 3 part Lovecraftian horror fpsc game series
I made this over a decade ago it was my very first game and as such is very flawed I still think the level design is great.... a shame about those cutscenes and wall textures tho.

despite its flaws, I hope someone will still enjoy it
